m_szDocTitle: Hyundai Ioniq launches in Korea before challenging Prius in US [w/video]
m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai Ioniq launches in Korea before challenging Prius in US [w/video] slide-3768919 Noah Joseph Enough with the teasers already: Hyundai has officially launched its first dedicated electrified vehicle. The Korean automaker is naturally rolling out the all-new model in its domestic market before sending it our way. But when it does arrive, it will offer a choice of three powertrains with decreasing levels of reliance on fossil fuels. Hyundai isn't saying how far or how fast the Ioniq hybrid will travel, but it will travel on electric mode at up to 75 miles per hour. Deriving its name from an
